title._content: Image taken from page 7 of 'Lemon Hill and Fairmount Park. The papers of C. S. K. and T. Cochran, relative to a Public Park for Philadelphia. Published in 1856 and 1872. Reprinted [with a preface and plan] by H. J. Smith'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Lemon Hill and Fairmount Park. The papers of C. S. K. and T. Cochran, relative to a Public Park for Philadelphia. Published in 1856 and 1872. Reprinted [with a preface and plan] by H. J. Smith" Author: KEYSER, Charles Shearer. Contributor: SMITH, Horace J. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10409.g.28." Page: 7 Place of Publishing: Philadelphia Date of Publishing: 1886 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001958707 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
